name: Yellow Tail
description: This wine shows ripe characters of peach and rockmelon, which are striking on the nose. This leads into a fresh and floral front palate where there is an up-front sweetness, adding to the wines` lengthy oak richness

name: Mark West Pinot Noir
description: The original. Medium-bodied with black cherry, cola, strawberry, plum, and soft tannins. No wonder this Pinot is a favorite.

name: Clos du Bois Chardonnay
description: Brilliant silver straw yellow in color. Intense aromas of apple blossom, ripe pear, and sweet lemon drop are complemented by toasty oak, spice, and cream. In the mouth, the silky texture of the wine is overlaid with bright, juicy flavors of ripe apple and pear for a long and fresh...

name: Franciscan Cabernet Sauvignon
description: Vivid garnet in color with perfumed and inviting aromas of rich dark cherry, plum,chocolate, and layered undertones of vanilla, clove, black pepper, and sage. A well-balanced expression of fruit and oak elements fills the palate with cassis, bright cherry, dark berry, toast, cedar, and a hint of vanilla. Round but structured, with well-knit tannins that impart texture and length on the finish.

name: Chateau Montelena Cabernet Sauvignon Estate
description: Medium garnet-brick colored, the 1996 Cabernet Sauvignon Estate features notions of cassis, warm blackberries and eucalypt with touches of mocha, smoked meats and sandalwood plus a waft of pencil lead. Medium to full-bodied, the palate is packed with rich, savory flavors, with a chewy frame and just enough vivacity, finishing long and meaty.

name: Colome Estate Malbec
description: Colomé Estate wines are growing more and more stylish and precise. One of the keys was the addition of an optical grape selector that allows winemakers to discard the dehydrated grapes. The 2019 vintage of the Malbec Estate is thus much fruitier with ripe plum and cherry over balsamic, herbal notes and a touch of sunny Calchaquí syrup. Both concentrated and juicy, the firm tannins sculpt the good volume and keep the energy in check, ensuring that it’s merely sprightly in contrast to the booming power of previous vintages. As pure and primary as ever but now with greater elegance

name: Diablo Creek Bourbon Barrel Aged Red Blend
description: The Diablo Creek Bourbon Barrel Aged Red Blend opens with flavors of lush black cherries, raspberry jam and red licorice. After aging in Bourbon barrels for 2 months, the rich palate leads with aromas of vanilla, spice and subtle char ending with a long and lingering finish.

name: Marques de Riscal Reserva
description: Bright garnet. Cherry and red currant aromas show good energy and take on floral and spice accents with air. Silky and open-knit, offering sweet red fruit and mocha flavors and a touch of bitter chocolate. Firms up through the nicely persistent finish, which features dusty tannins and lingering spice and cherry pit notes.

name: Allan Scott Sauvignon Blanc
description: Supple and succulent, offering a generous and juicy mix of passion fruit, Key lime and ruby grapefruit flavors. Expressive and strong on the finish, with touches of freshly grated ginger and green tea. Drink now. 50,000 cases made, 16,000 cases imported.

name: Bogle Merlot
description: Bold, ripe and saturated black-fruit flavors fill this full-bodied wine with a lot of pleasure, as black cherries and dried plums coat the palate. Attractive hints of black pepper and toasted oak lift the aroma and add complexity

name: Confidencial Reserva
description: Boasting a balanced combination of oak and ripe fruit, this wine is rich and full of juicy spiced-fruit flavors. Flavors of black currant and a hint of toastiness are fully integrated into this ready-to-drink wine. Drink now.

name: 19 Crimes Snoop Dogg Cali Red
description: Full and dense, with strong black & blue fruit notes up front from the Petite Sirah, complemented by bright red, slightly candied fruit in the background from the Zinfandel. The darkly toasted oak ties it all together along with a slightly sweet finish.

name: Apothic Crush Red Blend
description: Apothic Crush Red Blend is a decadent red wine with luscious notes of ripe berries, raspberry jam and hints of caramel, rounded out by a smooth finish.

name: Barton & Guestier Vouvray
description: Pale straw with green highlights. Great nose of subtle white flowers mixed with white peach fruit. A lovely and intense wine with floral notes, peach and pear flavors.

name: Zenato Pinot Grigio
description: Lemon-green in color, aromas of Key limes and white peaches complement undertones of green apples and grains of paradise. On the palate, it is smooth and refreshing with a long, pleasant finish.

name: Joel Gott Cabernet Sauvignon 815
description: Loganberry, sassafras and anise notes mix together in this red, with a juicy finish that keeps everything focused. Not big, but shows nice character and balance. Drink now through 2022. 127,000 cases made.

name: Chateau Latour Pauillac
description: Brilliant, intense aromas of mineral, blackberry and currant, with hints of Indian spices and cigar box, lead to a full-bodied palate, with ultrafine tannins and a beautiful balance of blackberry, raspberry and mineral. There's subtlety, yet also great depth. Lasts for minutes on the palate. This is a Latour with fabulous tone and vigor.

name: Dom Perignon
description: Wonderfully subtle, complex aromas of white flowers, acacia honey, minerals, nuts and mushroom, with musky and leesy nuances. Oily, rich and smoky but with terrific verve and lift. Quite substantial and chewy for a young D.P. but not at all heavy. Yellow plum and strong soil tones in the middle and on thepalate-staining finish. Offers a rare combination of richness and finesse.

name: Bollinger RD Spectre Limited Edition Crystal Set
description: Only 307 of the crystal sets have been produced, crafted by Saint Louis crystal works in Lorraine, to showcase the producer’s R.D 1988 Bollinger - part of the producer’s late-release and recently disgorged prestige cuvee vintage Champagne range. Designed by Eric Berthes of Saint Louis, the Bollinger Spectre Crystal Set features a Bollinger 007 signature marked with the sign of the octopus, the Spectre. The Bollinger Spectre Crystal set comes with a magnum of Bollinger 1988 R.D.

name: Gerard Bertrand Cotes des Roses Rose
description: A soft, pale, brilliant pink with bluish tints developing over time towards more orangey nuances. The bouquet releases aromas of summer fruits, cassis and redcurrant. Floral notes of rose along with hints of grapefruit complete the picture. The finish is fresh, offering notes of candy. On the palate the impression is fresh and full, with great aromatic persistence and balance.

name: Crossbow Pinot Noir
description: This firm red is filled with plenty of toasty richness to the well-structured dark fruit and spice flavors. Open-textured midpalate, with a long finish filled with loam and cocoa powder accents. Drink now through 2024. 1,500 cases made.

name: Viator Cabernet Sauvignon
description: Dark and appealing. Deep flavors of black cherry and cassis with a vanilla tinge and a long, smooth finish. A lot of Cab for the money. Balanced and so pleasing on its own, but try it with a grilled steak or smoked pork for a savory pairing.

name: Lindemans Bin 65 Chardonnay
description: Lindeman’s Bin 65 Chardonnay features aromas of fruit salad, peach, fig, rockmelon and toasty oak, it’s medium bodied with a fresh, crisp finish.

name: Talbott Kali Hart Pinot Noir
description: Bright magenta. Lively raspberry, cherry, allspice and floral scents are energized by a bright mineral quality. Appealingly sweet and penetrating on the palate, offering red fruit preserve, bitter cherry and spicecake flavors that become more lively on the back half. Subtle tannins lend shape to a long, juicy finish that...

name: Clark & Sheffield Zinfandel
description: Dusty red raspberry and cassis jump from the glass with notes of brown leather and cinnamon. Medium bodied, smooth tannins, and a long finish with ripe raspberry, cracked-pepper and baking spices.

name: Caymus Cabernet Sauvignon
description: A rich, showy style, with a very creamy texture to its mix of warmed vanilla, plum and boysenberry puree, and melted black licorice flavors. A mocha notes swirls around the fruit on the finish. Drink now through 2028. 141,348 cases made.

name: Bogle Cabernet Sauvignon
description: A broad texture plus warm, ripe flavors of roasted plums and milk chocolate give this full-bodied wine an easy entry, while rather light tannins don't interrupt its smooth flow on the palate. -

name: Kendall Jackson Vintner's Reserve Chardonnay
description: Concentrated and creamy but not overly showy, this wine is balanced, restrained and layered. It meshes an apple-tart flavor with subtle vanilla and nutmeg nuances while underlying acidity achieves excellent balance.

name: Innocent Bystander Pink Moscato
description: Fairy floss, blackcurrant, Turkish delight and mandarin peel. Wild strawberry, violets & honeycomb with well balanced sweetness. Goes with fresh summer berries and double cream, crêpes with lemon syrup and orange zest, blue cheese with pear.

name: Michael David Freakshow Cabernet Sauvignon
description: The first star in our Freakshow series, our Cabernet Sauvignon is bold and muscular with poise and grace! Raspberry, plum, and toasted vanilla aromas open the show leaving you wanting more. Full bodied showcasing flavors of red cherry, hints of floral and dark fruit with tannins coming through the lasting, oak-kissed finish.

name: Dansk Mjod Viking Blod
description: This artisan metheglin-style Danish mead has hibiscus & hops, which give it a soft, citrus-like flavor and very floral aroma. Its finish is hoppy-dry, spicy, and very warming.

name: 1000 Stories Bourbon Barrel Zinfandel
description: The wine has a deep, rich purple color. Intense red fruits are on the nose with black pepper spice and a touch of cloves and dried herbs.

name: Dansk Mjod Vikingernes Mjod
description: Golden honey with no head. Port wine aromas. Serve slightly chilled in a wine glass as an aperitif, or over ice with fruits. At room temperature in a port wine glass, it is excellent as dessert wine; for a winter warmer, heat the liquid without boiling and serve in a mug.

name: Roederer Estate Brut
description: An enticing, toasty, nutty aroma leads to crisp and complex flavors in this medium-bodied wine that is braced by good acidity and a fine bead of bubbles. Subtle, mature notes complement the elegant texture.

name: Codorniu Anna de Codorniu Brut Rose
description: This would be a good sparkling wine for a romantic dinner, thanks to the attractive red-berry and candied-orange character. Dry and substantial enough on the palate to be good with a wide range of dishes. The clean finish draws you back for more. Drink now.

name: Daimon Shuzo Tozai Junmai Snow Maiden Nigori
description: Tozai Junmai Nigori Snow Maiden Sake appropriately carries the image of a coy its label as the sake is named after Japan’s most famous coy named Hanako. With its rice and fruit combination, the sake has a creamy fruity taste of radish, raw pumpkin, and honeydew melon. Best served with spicy foods, seafood or pork.

name: TYKU Junmai Ginjo Sake Black Bottle
description: TY KU Sake Black's refined flavor profile balances peach on the nose with a subtle hint of spice underneath. The depth and body pairs well with lighter Western fare (grilled white meats and cooked fish), yet is dry and delicate enough to complement Asian cuisine.

name: Stella Rosa Moscato d'Asti
description: Moscato d’ Asti is a semi sweet wine made from the Moscato di Canelli grape from the Piedmont region of Italy. Sweet but not overly sweet with just enough bubbles. Great as an aperitif or with light meals. Refreshing taste with a clean finish.

name: H3 Merlot
description: The oak has a strong influence on the aromas and flavors, with notes of vanilla, baking spice and coconut. It seems under-fruited for the oak impact.

name: Barefoot Merlot
description: Bursting with the all the rich flavors of juicy cherries, boysenberries, sweet plums, and smooth chocolate, Barefoot Merlot wine is a classic red wine with one bold personality. Learn more about one of the best red Merlot wines around today!

name: Barefoot Red Moscato
description: Aromas of cranberry chutney, spiced watermelon and nougat with a crisp, petillant, fruity medium-to-full body and a zesty candied lime and blood orange finish. Very tasty and mouthwatering.

name: Barefoot Moscato
description: Delightfully sweet with lush fruity aromas. Hints of citrus skip across flavors of juicy peach and ripe apricots. A bright, crisp finish dances in at the end. It’s a bit sweeter than our Riesling.

name: Barefoot Riesling
description: This light-bodied, sweet wine has flavors of juicy nectarine, sweet peach and ripe pear. Bright and vibrant acidity complements its refreshing finish.
